summary: high quality texture replacement for dwarven set
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=green]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive-release[/b],
please respect my decision and
[b]DO NOT reupload it elsewhere...[/b].
I did not give nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.

old V1 is available in download section for anyone wants to use it for his own mods INSIDE nexus sites clearly as long as credits are given.




the mod:

[center][color=green][size=5][b]High Resolution Texture-Replacer for Dwarven set[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[size=3]

*** HD texture replacer for dwarven armor and shield

*** As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.

*** Same resolution as the official high-res DLC textures

*** This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions (for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.

*** [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: to install just drop the "textures-folder" inside your data-folder or use mod manager.[/size]

*** highter resolution (4K) is available as optional download



credits:

emerson lake and palmer ,gentle giants, the socks ,the sky at the end of the summer.
author: CaBaL
